General.Name: Autel Intelligent Technology Corp Ltd
General.Description: Autel Intelligent Technology Corp., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and servicing of automotive intelligent diagnostics equipment, detection and analysis systems, and automotive electronic components. Its products portfolio includes diagnostic tools, key programming products, specialty tools, radar sensors, electric chargers, TPMS diagnostic and service tools, and advanced driver-assistance systems (ADAS) calibration products. The company also provides battery services; software update solutions; and cloud-based repair and diagnosis platform. It primarily sells its products to approximately 50 countries and regions, including the United States, Germany, the United Kingdom, and Australia. Autel Intelligent Technology Corp., Ltd. was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
